Package core.grammar

Interface Summary
CreateGrammar Interface that defines the methods that are required to create the Grammar (load from a file or a interactive creation).
Derivation The inteface declares the methods that define the responsabilities of a Derivation object.
Element The inteface that defines a common ancestor to NonTerminal, Terminal and Production objects.
Function Interface that defines the methods that are required to create a function to be associated to the Derivation's nodes and applied over the Grammar symbols The interface encapsulates (hides) from the Grammar the several kind of functions to be implemented.
Grammar The inteface declares the methods that define the responsabilities of a general Grammar.
NonTerminal The inteface declares the methods that define the responsabilities of a NonTerminal object.
ParseDerivation  
Production The inteface declares the methods that define the responsabilities of a Production object.
StochasticContextFreeGrammar The inteface declares the methods that define the responsabilities of a Stochastic Context Free Grammar (SCFG).
Terminal The inteface declares the methods that define the responsabilities of a Terminal object.
 

Class Summary
CreateGrammarImpl Class that offers a concrete implementation of the interface CreateGrammar.
DerivationAux_InternalImpl  
DerivationComparator  
DerivationImpl  
ElementImpl Class that offers a concrete implementation of the interface Element.
FunctionImpl Class that offers a concrete implementation of the interface Function.
GrammarImpl Class that offers a concrete implementation of the interface Grammar.
NonTerminalImpl Class that offers a concrete implementation of the interface NonTerminal.
ParseDerivationImpl  
ProductionImpl Class that offers a concrete implementation of the interface Production.
StochasticContextFreeGrammarImpl  
TerminalImpl Class that offers a concrete implementation of the interface Terminal.
Test0_internalImpl  
Test1_internalImpl  
Test3_internalImpl  
Test4_internalImpl  
Test5_internalImpl  
Test6_internalImpl  
Test7_internalImpl  
Test8_internalImpl  
Test9_internalImpl  
 

Exception Summary
GrammarExceptionImpl Class that implements a custom Exception in order to handle the exceptions that can appear processing the Grammar.
GrammarMaxDepthExceptionImpl Class that implements a custom Exception in order to handle the exceptions that can appear derivating a Production in the Grammar with a restriction of Max depth..
